title: Implement load testing framework for WhatsApp, Discord, and Slack
description:
Create comprehensive load testing framework to validate Omni can handle 10,000+ messages per hour across all supported platforms.

**Scope:**
- WhatsApp load testing suite (10k+ msgs/hour)
- Discord load testing suite (10k+ msgs/hour)
- Slack load testing suite (10k+ msgs/hour)
- Performance baseline reporting
- CI/CD integration for regression testing

**Approach:**
- Use locust or k6 for load generation
- Mock external APIs where appropriate
- Measure latency, throughput, error rates
- Generate performance reports
